# poplin

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/HimesGroup/poplin/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/HimesGroup/poplin/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of poplin package is to provide simple tools for processing LC/MS
metabolomics data processing, including

- Missing value imputation
- Data normalization
- Dimension reduction
- Visualization

To install this package, 

```{r install, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("jaehyunjoo/poplin")
```
